Game.Name: Sekigahara (Japan)
Game.plot: Hex based strategy based around the famous Japanese battle of 1600.http://www.pcengine.co.uk/HTML_Games/Sekigahara.htmCheat: Debug MenuAt the "Tonkin House" logo, hold I + II until the debug menu appears.
Game.Notes: Sekigahara is a hex-based strategy war-sim published by Tonkin House. The game is named for and depicts the Battle of Sekigahara, which would later establish the Tokagawa shogunate and ended the Sengoku era of Japan. Players move their various samurai units in alternating turns as they set up their armies for a climactic battle.
